entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 25.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind west 30 km/h. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 43 this morning and minus 37 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 27. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy before morning with 30 percent chance of snow. Wind west 20 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 39 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CDT Monday 13 March 2023
